name: Match Jong FREE
description:
Match your way through numerous levels in this exciting puzzle adventure.
Take on this colorful Matching game alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Match Jong features:
★ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.
★ 4 different locations with numerous levels.
★ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
★ 2 difficulty modes;
★ Bright and attractive graphics;
★ Relaxing sound effects.

Walkthrough: https://youtu.be/8w1D_Ic6vYk
